curam.omega3.request
Class RequestHandlerFactory

java.lang.Object
  curam.omega3.request.RequestHandlerFactory

public final class RequestHandlerFactory
extends java.lang.Object

The factory object responsible for creating request handler objects. When a request is received, the handler used to parse the request object is added as an attribute to the request object. If another request handler is requested to parse the same request object, the stored handler is returned instead.

Method Summary
static RequestHandler getRequestHandler(javax.servlet.ServletRequest request)
          Gets a request handler that can be used to access the parameters of the specified request object.

Method Detail

getRequestHandler

public static RequestHandler getRequestHandler(javax.servlet.ServletRequest request)
                                        throws RequestException
Gets a request handler that can be used to access the parameters of the specified request object. The RequestHandler will handle either simple or multi-part requests and parse all the parameters.

Parameters:
request - The request object to be handled.
Returns:
The request handler object that holds the request items.
Throws:
RequestException - if the request handler cannot be created.
